document_data.name: Random Riellor
document_data.mainbody: '''Random Riellor''', or '''Random the Mad''', was a [[necromancer]] who wandered the entire breadth of [[Faerûn]].
document_data.Personality: Brilliant and capable, Random was an accomplished spellcaster whose personality seemed to vary on a daily basis.
document_data.Activities: Random wandered the Realms in search of magic that would further his research. He was the only [[Halruaa|non-Halruaan]] wizard known to crack the mystery of [[southern magic]] through the use of his unique spell, ''[[read southern magic]]''..
document_data.Possessions: Among other magical items, Random owned a ''[[ring of teleportation]]'' which he used frequently during his travels. He kept a [[Halruaan Skyship|skyship]], fully outfitted with a [[spelljamming helm]], in orbit high above Faerûn.
